title: Was the Pendry Challenge a very quick warning about the risk of overdose?
subtitle: The challenge of the Internet, which spread in 2020, has joined a long list of serious challenges that have targeted adolescents in social media.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The so-called Benadryl Challenge became viral in Teek Tok in 2020, challenging adolescents with an overdose of sensitive drugs to obtain hallucinations, resulting in warnings from medical experts about the risk of overdose death.
